title: CANNOT LOGIN TO GAME
body: I'm unable to login to game as it tells me that I cannot connect to the server. I also cannot submit a ticket for help, because it doesn't let me choose a language...

replies.body: There were some server issues during this period per our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  Everything should be okay now!  Let me know if you still have any issues.
same is happing to me i repatchted and it still wont let me login
